query:
INSERT INTO trip_items (
                    item_id,
                    trip_id,
                    pick,
                    pack,
                    ready,
                    new,
                    user_id
                ) SELECT
                    id as item_id,
                    $1 as trip_id,
                    false as pick,
                    false as pack,
                    false as ready,
                    false as new,
                    user_id
                FROM inventory_items
                WHERE user_id = $2
